title: This is the challenge
creator_credit: United Nations. Film Board and United Nations. Dept. of Public Information
brief_description: United Nations Day, October 24th, marks the anniversary of the birth of the World Organisation. This film has been designed not only to bring to mind some of the peace-making achievements of these first seven years but to throw into perspective the attack launched by the United Nations and its Member States upon the basic causes underlying dispute and war.
